block.p: Marcy Jacqueline Oppenheimer and Joseph Hickman Neale are to be married today by Rabbi Emily Faust Korzenik at the Beach Point Club in Mamaroneck, N.Y.

Ms. Oppenheimer, 37, will keep her name. In August, she will begin her second year at the Georgetown University School of Medicine in Washington. She received a bachelor's degree from Yale University and a law degree from New York University. From 1993 to 1995, she was the special assistant to the deputy director of the United States Public Health Service, and from 1995 to 1997 she was a special assistant to the administrator of the Health Care Financing Administration, both in Washington.
Marcy Jacqueline Oppenheimer and Joseph Hickman Neale are to be married today by Rabbi Emily Faust Korzenik at the Beach Point Club in Mamaroneck, N.Y.

Ms. Oppenheimer, 37, will keep her name. In August, she will begin her second year at the Georgetown University School of Medicine in Washington. She received a bachelor's degree from Yale University and a law degree from New York University. From 1993 to 1995, she was the special assistant to the deputy director of the United States Public Health Service, and from 1995 to 1997 she was a special assistant to the administrator of the Health Care Financing Administration, both in Washington.

She is a daughter of State Senator Suzi Oppenheimer and Martin J. Oppenheimer of Mamaroneck. Her father is a senior partner at Proskauer Rose, the New York law firm. He is also the chairman of the City Center of Music and Drama, the organization that oversees the City Opera and City Ballet. Her mother, a Democrat, represents the 36th District, in Westchester County.
Mr. Neale, 55, is the chairman of the biology department at Georgetown University, where he conducts brain research. He received a bachelor's degree and a Ph.D. in biochemistry from Georgetown.

He is a son of the late Sara G. Neale and John R. Neale. His father retired as a senior vice president at the American Security and Trust Company, a bank that was in Washington. The bridegroom's previous marriage ended in divorce.

WEDDINGS Correction: July 9, 2000, Sunday A picture credit with a report on June 25 about the wedding of Marcy Jacqueline Oppenheimer and Joseph Hickman Neale misidentified the photographer. She is Elizabeth Loeb, not Leslie Barton.
A picture credit with a report on June 25 about the wedding of Marcy Jacqueline Oppenheimer and Joseph Hickman Neale misidentified the photographer. She is Elizabeth Loeb, not Leslie Barton.
